understanding.C: PR #786 adds a documentation update capturing the P3-2 /ask update_north_star result for metrics-echo in docs/memory/metrics_echo_design.md. The run is plan-only due to an SLI mismatch between READY (plan) and devbox (environment).

acceptance: Acknowledged. Will label, comment, create a tracking issue for the SLI mismatch, and enable auto-merge.
